code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import Sidebar from"./Sidebar.js";import"./dashboard.css";import{Typography}from"@material-ui/core";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Doughnut,Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{getAdminProduct}from"../../actions/productAction";import{getAllOrders}from"../../actions/orderAction.js";import{getAllUsers}from"../../actions/userAction.js";import MetaData from"../layout/MetaData";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{products}=useSelector(state=>state.products);const{orders}=useSelector(state=>state.allOrders);const{users}=useSelector(state=>state.allUsers);let outOfStock=0;products&&products.forEach(item=>{if(item.Stock===0){outOfStock+=1;}});useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getAdminProduct());dispatch(getAllOrders());dispatch(getAllUsers());},[dispatch]);let totalAmount=0;orders&&orders.forEach(item=>{totalAmount+=item.totalPrice;});const lineState={labels:["Initial Amount","Amount Earned"],datasets:[{label:"TOTAL AMOUNT",backgroundColor:["tomato"],hoverBackgroundColor:["rgb(197, 72, 49)"],data:[0,totalAmount]}]};const productLength=products&&products.length;const doughnutState={labels:["Out of Stock","InStock"],datasets:[{backgroundColor:["#00A6B4","#6800B4"],hoverBackgroundColor:["#4B5000","#35014F"],data:[outOfStock,productLength-outOfStock]}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetaData,{title:"Dashboard - Admin Panel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboardContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"h1",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboardSummary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total Amount ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," \u20B9",totalAmount]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboardSummaryBox2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/admin/products",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:products&&products.length})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/admin/orders",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:orders&&orders.length})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/admin/users",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:users&&users.length})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"lineChart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:lineState})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"doughnutChart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doughnut,{data:doughnutState})})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
